THANK YOU SO MUCH.

>> Stephen: HEY!
NICE TO SEE YOU.
HEY, KRIS.

EVERYBODY.

GOOD LUCK, FELLAS.

SEE, WE'VE BEEN OFF FOR A WEEK.
LET'S SEE, WHAT HAPPENED?

KIND OF A BIG STORY.
AND WE WERE ON VACATION.

WILL THE COUNTRY I LOVE APPEAR

EYES?

RIGHT NOW.

NOW.
